markdown:
[Skip to content](https://s3rs.com/category/uncategorized/page/2/#content)

We are R2-Cerified and have a Zero Landfill Policy!

- Call today to schedule a pickup! [888-970-S3RS](tel:8889707377)


[Client Portal](https://s3erpportal.makor-erp.com/portal)

[![S3 Recycling Solutions Logo](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/S3-logo-white-for-web-375-x-144.png)](https://s3rs.com/)

- [![S3 Inc 5000 20232](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/S3-Inc-5000-2023-web-1-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2023/08/s3-ranks-no-1006-on-the-inc-5000/)


## [S3 Ranks No. 1006 on the INC 5000](https://s3rs.com/2023/08/s3-ranks-no-1006-on-the-inc-5000/)

S3 ranks No. 1006 on the 2023 Inc. 5000, an annual list of the fastest-growing private companies in America. This is the third consecutive year that the firm has been named to the prestigious ranking.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2023-08-15T11:15:01+00:00August 15th, 2023\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2023/08/s3-ranks-no-1006-on-the-inc-5000/)

- [![S3 warehouse](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/S3-warehouse-Copy-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2023/06/s3-buys-78000-sf-warehouse-hires-coo/)


## [S3 Buys 78,000 SF Warehouse, Hires COO](https://s3rs.com/2023/06/s3-buys-78000-sf-warehouse-hires-coo/)

S3 purchased another building in Springfield, Tenn. – adding 78,000 square feet of warehouse space to its real estate portfolio. The company also hired John Revetti as chief operations officer.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2023-06-29T19:40:04+00:00June 29th, 2023\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2023/06/s3-buys-78000-sf-warehouse-hires-coo/)

- [![R2V3 2023](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/R2V3-2023-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2023/03/r2v3/)


## [S3 Receives Important R2v3 Certification](https://s3rs.com/2023/03/r2v3/)

S3 received R2v3 certification at its 75,000 sq ft facility in Springfield, Tenn., ensuring proper processes, safety measures and documentation are followed to responsibly recycle technology assets.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2023-03-09T15:57:51+00:00March 8th, 2023\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2023/03/r2v3/)

- [![Dec 2022 board](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Web-Dec-2022-board-320x202.png)](https://s3rs.com/2022/12/s3-appoints-three-new-members-to-its-board/)


## [S3 Appoints Three Members to Its Board](https://s3rs.com/2022/12/s3-appoints-three-new-members-to-its-board/)

S3 Recycling Solutions, an R2-certified electronics recycler and Inc. 5000 fastest-growing private company, today announced the appointment of Ray Guzman, Wanda C. Lyle and Richard Pinson to its board.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-12-20T21:11:45+00:00December 19th, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/12/s3-appoints-three-new-members-to-its-board/)

- [![Brian Moyer](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Brian-Moyer-November-web-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2022/11/s3-appoints-brian-moyer-as-board-chair/)


## [S3 Appoints Tech Exec as Board Chair](https://s3rs.com/2022/11/s3-appoints-brian-moyer-as-board-chair/)

S3 Recycling Solutions named Brian Moyer, former President and CEO of the Greater Nashville Technology Council, chairman of its board of advisors. Moyer will serve a three-year appointment in the role.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-11-10T06:25:22+00:00November 10th, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/11/s3-appoints-brian-moyer-as-board-chair/)

- [![Nathan Freeman](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Rod-and-Nate-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2022/10/the-legacy-of-darrell-s-freeman-sr/)


## [Honoring The Legacy of Darrell S. Freeman, Sr.](https://s3rs.com/2022/10/the-legacy-of-darrell-s-freeman-sr/)

S3 Recycling Solutions hires Nathan Freeman, the youngest child of Past Chairman Darrell S. Freeman, Sr., as a sales executive. In this blog, CEO Rod McDaniel reflects on continuing Darrell's legacy by mentoring his son.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-10-26T15:37:53+00:00October 26th, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/10/the-legacy-of-darrell-s-freeman-sr/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Rayna-Named-Director-of-Logistics-3-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2022/08/bosemer-named-s3-director-of-logistics/)


## [Bosemer Named S3 Director of Logistics](https://s3rs.com/2022/08/bosemer-named-s3-director-of-logistics/)

S3 Recycling Solutions has named Rayna Bosemer to the position of director of logistics. A previous member of the client services team at the firm, Bosemer now leads the process for successfully initiating and executing customer jobs.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-08-31T20:48:26+00:00August 31st, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/08/bosemer-named-s3-director-of-logistics/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Inc-5000-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2022/08/s3-appears-on-inc-5000-for-2nd-year-with-3-year-revenue-growth-of-382/)


## [S3 Appears on 2022 Inc. 5000, With 3-Year Revenue Growth of 382%](https://s3rs.com/2022/08/s3-appears-on-inc-5000-for-2nd-year-with-3-year-revenue-growth-of-382/)

For the second consecutive year, S3 Recycling Solutions appears on the Inc. 5000 list of fastest-growing private companies in America, ranking No. 1,640 with a three-year revenue growth of 382 percent.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-08-16T18:35:15+00:00August 16th, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/08/s3-appears-on-inc-5000-for-2nd-year-with-3-year-revenue-growth-of-382/)

- [![Moyer](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Web-site-B-Moyer-1-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2022/05/former-tech-council-ceo-moyer-joins-s3-board/)


## [Former Tech Council CEO Joins S3 Board](https://s3rs.com/2022/05/former-tech-council-ceo-moyer-joins-s3-board/)

S3 Recycling Solutions today announced that Brian Moyer, former President and CEO of the Greater Nashville Technology Council, is the newest member of its Board of Advisors. Effective May 1, 2022, Moyer joins the board for a three-year appointment.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-05-02T19:12:12+00:00May 2nd, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/05/former-tech-council-ceo-moyer-joins-s3-board/)

- [![2022 BPTW](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/BPTW-logo-2022-1-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2022/04/s3-named-2022-best-places-to-work-honoree/)


## [S3 Named 2022 Best Places To Work Honoree](https://s3rs.com/2022/04/s3-named-2022-best-places-to-work-honoree/)

S3 Recycling Solutions was announced as a 2022 Best Places to Work honoree by Nashville Business Journal. To view the complete article, visit https://bizj.us/1qezrv.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-05-02T19:16:49+00:00April 28th, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/04/s3-named-2022-best-places-to-work-honoree/)
